# Build manifest - expected contents of _site
# Update this file when intentionally adding/removing site content
#
# Syntax:
#   dir/        - directory (contents not checked by this test)
#   page.*      - page with format variants (.html, .md, .pdf, .epub)
#   file.ext    - exact file
#
# Sitemap section uses full URLs

blog/

worker.js

[sitemap]
